projects.title: Blog App
projects.description: Our Flutter app provides secure authentication and easy blog management, online or offline, with Supabase, Bloc, Hive, and GetIt for reliability and flexibility

projects.title: BMI Calculator
projects.description: The Flutter-built BMI Calculator App effectively helps users conveniently track and manage their BMI with user-friendly input and tracking

projects.title: Reddit Clone App
projects.description: RedditClone, a feature-rich Flutter app built with Dart, leverages Riverpod for efficient state management, faithfully emulating the essence of Reddit

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio built with Flutter and Riverpod, hosted on Firebase to seamlessly showcase skills and projects across all devices.

projects.title: Fitgram
projects.description: A seamless platform for managing gym facilities, developed with Flutter and Firebase for efficient use by owners, trainers, and members

projects.title: Music App
projects.description: A music app built with Flutter, using Riverpod, Hive, MVVM, and a Python API with PostgreSQL for seamless music management and playback
